sub_title: Marketing Manager @The Waste Transformers | Owner @CLRBLND Concepts
summary:
Coen Bakker: Marketing-Brand Manager, Speaker and Filmmaker | Sustainable Mindset 

Welcome to my LinkedIn profile! I'm Coen Bakker, a marketing-brand manager with a passion for sustainability. Over the years, I have worked with various international organizations in diverse roles, driving impactful change.

I am the founder of CLRBLND Concepts, my own filmmaking company for sustainable businesses. We collaborate with clients who share our sustainable mindset, creating visuals that inspire positive positive action.

Currently, I'm part of The Waste Transformers team, leading all branding, marketing and communication activities for this international technology brand with a human mindset. We are revolutionizing the way businesses handle their food waste streams on-site, with activities on a global scale, transforming a technology brand into a powerful force for human change. Our Waste Transformers, innovative anaerobic digesters housed within shipping containers, offer benefits for the organisation and environmentally:

- #1 solution to reduce greenhouse gas emissions (according to www.projectdrawdown.org).
- Turn food waste collection costs into revenue streams.
- Generate on-site green energy (biogas or electricity & heat).
- Extract valuable nutrients to produce your own natural fertilizer on-site to replace chemical fertilizers.
- Share your sustainability mindset with your clients.

I'm passionate about driving positive environmental impact and fostering sustainable practices. Let's connect and explore how we can collaborate to make a difference. Reach out to me at coen.bakker@thewastetransformers.com.

Together, we can transform the world. The Waste Transformers: From food waste, to value.

With 3 strategic locations, Houston, London and Singapore we are able to respond quickly to any Emergency response enquiry. We provide aircraft charter solutions, cargo projects and passenger operations.

courses.name: Masterclass Digital Marketing & Communication - Amsterdam Advanced Graduate School

profile_positions.company: The Waste Transformers | Turn your own food-waste into value
profile_positions.description:
Marketing and Brand Manager | Public Speaker | Filmmaker | Sustainability Advocate

I'm passionate about creating a positive impact on our environment through innovative sustainable solutions. Currently, I  hold a dynamic position where I drive the development of marketing strategies, brand design (both online and offline), and captivating storytelling for international sustainability projects.

Embracing a global perspective, my role involves international travel, with approximately 20% of my time dedicated to collaborating with stakeholders across borders.

About The Waste Transformers—a visionary organization that addresses the pressing issue of food waste, as a major (and unknown) environmental polluter. Our mission is to revolutionize the way businesses and communities handle food waste and transform it into opportunities for a greener future. Here's how we do it:

- Our Waste Transformers: Anaerobic digesters placed on-site where food waste is produced.
- Transforming food waste into clean energy for the same location.
- Converting food waste into organic liquid fertilizer, replacing chemical fertilizers.

The impact is substantial. By avoiding the transportation and dumping of food waste to landfills, our clients reduce methane emissions and retain valuable nutrients, creating a more sustainable and efficient ecosystem.

To learn more about our work, visit http://www.TheWasteTransformers.com. Feel free to reach out to me at coen.bakker@thewastetransformers.com to explore how we can collaborate on driving positive change.

Together, let's revolutionize food waste management and pave the way for a greener, more sustainable future. The Waste Transformers: From food waste, to value
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Coen is founder of the Amsterdam based CLRBLND Concepts filmproduction for sustainable companies.

We all know colour-blinds see the world a bit different compared to the majority. Coen as colour-blind himself as well, which he has translated into developing honest, human and engaging films especially for honest [read sustainable] brands about organisations'​ products, services and brands. If your clients believe what you believe as an organisation, your clients have a bigger urge to become loyal to your brand. 

Let them know your organisation in a transparent way, by CLRBLND Concepts.
http://www.clrblndconcepts.com
profile_positions.title: Founder | Sustainability Filmmaker | Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description: Explored the other side of the world, New Zealand and Australia in a campervan. During this trip I interviewed travellers about their dreams and future for www.Ygenwijs.nl and produced video's from New Zealand about the Generation Y abroad.
profile_positions.title: Traveling

profile_positions.description:
In my role as a consultant at Kirkman Company and YSE, I have participated in several projects at various organizations: 

- Transavia.com: Executed a sourcing analysis for the IT operations domain as part of the IT continuity. The analysis included internal employees interviews, organisational analysis and recommendations for possible sourcing scenarios.

- ABN AMRO, Beter: Executed organisational research to develop a Product Service Catalogue consisting of all current products and services currently provided by the organisation. 

- Reed Business Information (RBI): I was project leader of four sectors (magazines). Activated four departments in executing market research to identify new data-driven market opportunities. Delivered for each sector in-depth market research and delivered potential new market opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Young Professional Management Consultant

profile_positions.location: London, United Kingdom and Frankfurt Germany
profile_positions.description: As part of the Business Intelligence Department at the corporate head office in London, I studied and advised the abilities to implement Global Account Management for all Chapman Freeborn’s global offices. This implementation increased cross-selling and international cooperation based on data analyses and market insights. For this function, I was based in London and Frankfurt.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Chapman Freeborn Airchartering is the largest aircraft charter service company in the world, listed within the top 250 largest, privately owned companies in the UK, providing a range of value added services to the aviation industry from passenger and cargo charter flights to airport representation. Air chartering for the Marine, Salvage and Offshore industry, where crew rotations by helicopter, direct responses to transport salvage equipment by air, and providing executive flights for salvage specialists worldwide are executed.

Projects vary between adhoc single day operations to long term lease programs. Wordwide coverage because of our local offices on each continent.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager Salvage, Marine, Offshore

profile_positions.description:
During this one-year voluntary board function besides my study at the VU University, I was responsible for the development and execution of all the marketing activities. Communication and design for five separate career events in Amsterdam, hosting between 50 and 550 participants. Due to very effective promotion and branding we realized a relative growth of over 30% more participants than in previous years. 

These events are organized for students who are in their final period of their study and starting their career. Prior to each event an intensive promotion period was established. Closing the year with our main event, the Make a Move Careerweek, with over 550 participants and 30 international companies. Based on the satisfaction study completed by 540 participants and 30 companies we received an overall grading of 8.9 out of 10. 

- We developed a complete new concept for a new niche event: Women at the Top, exclusively women only, hosting 120 participants in cooperation with Microsoft and Women INC, to discuss the position of women in the working environment.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager, Make A Move Carrièreweek

profile_positions.description:
During this management traineeship, I assisted the VP Operations in the Corporate Office of Dusit International, an international hotel chain based in Bangkok. 
Responsibilities:
- Writing and re-structuring Pre-Opening manuals for new to open hotels by the Dusit organisation.
- Restructuring and standardize corporate business lounges of sub-brand hotels.
profile_positions.title: Management trainee/ Assistant Operation Manager, Dusit International Thailand

profile_positions.description: As part of the study International Hotel Management, a practical internship is fulfilled in the second year. During this internship in Vienna, I was working in different departments. I completed this internship with high satisfaction, learned to speak German fluently.
profile_positions.title: International Internship
